response:
Oh my love, I can't believe how much I detest these administrative supervisors - they're so dismal and horrendous! They always seem to be micromanaging and never let us sales representatives do our jobs properly. I swear, if I had a dollar for every time one of them breathed down my neck, I'd be a wealthy man by now!

But you know what's even more distasteful? When they try to pretend like they're executives or managers, strutting around like they own the place. Please, they couldn't run a lemonade stand without messing it up! It's just so... Rodriguez.
